Robin

riginal Message -----

om>

year older, and a lot deeper in debt!
   
   Frank-S

f course I did!

        It=

knob like all the other boxes it's perfect.

oups.com

anyone get a chance to listen to the one I did the tone control test on? It=
's an attempt at something like a clarifier control. It's in my folder, und=
er the files section, and the test is more toward the end of the segment. 
=
           
           Frank-S

k,

 most part the noise over took everything.

              To: =
evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
              From: franks-boxes@...
      =
        Date: Wed, 2 Jan 2008 00:13:05 -0700
              Subject: [EVP-IT=
C] 


               These are direct from the system output speaker, the s=
peaker that will provide the raw audio output for this box. There seems to =
be more static on the AM band tonight, part of that is cuz I think this boa=
rd has more RF gain at the antenna then the previous board. It probably dep=
ends on the type of core I used for the coil, and since they are from the j=
unk box, I have no idea what the permeability rating is for these cores. Th=
e core being a ferrite bobbin that I wind the coil on. 
               
   =
            Frank-S
